sentences.en: a £20,000 bonus

sentences.en: a Christmas bonus
sentences.cn: 圣诞节奖金

sentences.en: A little bonus will give the employees an incentive to work harder.
sentences.cn: 一点奖金可以刺激雇员更加努力地工作.

sentences.en: An unexpected bonus had revived the spirits of Keycase Milne.
sentences.cn: 一笔意外的收入使奇开匙·米尔恩的精神重新振作起来.

sentences.en: Bonus notices were issued each year from head office to local agents.
sentences.cn: 分红通告每年由总公司发送至地方代理商。

sentences.en: Each employee received a like bonus.
sentences.cn: 每个雇员都得到了相同数目的奖金.

sentences.en: Each worker receives an annual bonus.
sentences.cn: 每个员工都可获得一笔年度奖金。

sentences.en: Every purchaser of a pound of coffee received a box of cookies as a bonus.
sentences.cn: 每买一磅咖啡的人都得到一盒免费奉送的饼干.

sentences.en: Further additions to your pay may take the form of bonus payments.
sentences.cn: 工资以外的钱可能以奖金的形式发放。

sentences.en: In addition to his salary, he has a bonus of 25 yuan per month.
sentences.cn: 除工资外, 他每月还有二十五元钱奖金.

sentences.en: It's made from natural ingredients, but with the added bonus of containing 30 per cent less fat than ordinary cheese.
sentences.cn: 该干酪用天然原料制成，而且其脂肪含量比普通干酪低30%。

sentences.en: Long-term savers qualify for a cash bonus.
sentences.cn: 长期储户可获现金红利。

sentences.en: That's a good place to start our discussion about this year's bonus.
sentences.cn: 对于我们商讨今年奖金一事来说,这是个很好的开头.

sentences.en: The staff got a a special bonus payment.
sentences.cn: 员工得到一笔特别发放的奖金。

sentences.en: The staff got a Christmas bonus.
sentences.cn: 员工在圣诞节得到了奖金.

sentences.en: The union has dropped its earlier insistence that workers should receive bonus payments.
sentences.cn: 工会起先坚持工人应当得到奖金,但是现在已经不再坚持了.

sentences.en: The workers expected to share out a year - end bonus .
sentences.cn: 工人们期望 年终 分红.

sentences.en: We felt we might finish third. Any better would be a bonus.
sentences.cn: 我们感觉我们可能会获得第三名，要是能比这个名次更好那就是意外的惊喜了。

sentences.en: We've also got a bonus quiz with crates of beer as prizes!
sentences.cn: 我们还获得了一次参加有奖智力竞赛的机会，奖品是成箱的啤酒！

sentences.en: What does your share of the bonus work out at?
sentences.cn: 算出你应得的红利是多少?
